Verses: 1 annaatkalil Ondril, Avar Dhevaalayaththile Janangalukku Ubadhesiththu Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththapodhu, Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum Moopparum Avaridaththil Koodivandhu:
2 neer Endha Adhigaaraththinaal Ivaigalaich Seygireer? Indha Adhigaaraththai Umakkuk Koduththavar Yaar? Adhai Engalukkuch Sollum Endraargal.
3 avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Naanum Ungalidaththil Oru Kaariyaththaik Ketkiren, Adhai Enakkuch Sollungal.
4 yovaan Koduththa Snaanam Dhevanaal Undaayitro? Manusharaal Undaayitro? Endru Kettaar.
5 avargal Thangalukkulle Yosanaipanni: Dhevanaal Undaayitru Endru Solvomaanaal, Pinnai En Avanai Visuvaasikkavillai Endru Ketpaar.
6 manusharaal Undaayitru Endru Solvomaanaal, Janangalellaarum Yovaanaith Theerkkadharisiyendru Ennugirapadiyinaal Nammel Kallerivaargal Endru Solli:
7 adhu Yaaraal Undaayitro, Engalukkuth Theriyaadhu Endru Piradhiyuththaram Sonnaargal.
8 appozhudhu Yesu: Naanum Inna Adhigaaraththinaal Ivaigalaich Seygirenendru Ungalukkuch Sollen Endraar.

9 pinbu Avar Janangalukkuch Sollath Thodangina Uvamaiyaavadhu: Oru Manushan Oru Thiraatchaththottaththai Undaakki, Adhaith Thottakkaararukkuk Kuththagaiyaaga Vittu, Nedunaalaagap Purathdhesaththukkup Poyirundhaan.

10 andhath Thottakkaarar Thiraatchaththottaththin Kanigalil Than Baagaththaik Koduththanuppumpadi, Paruvakkaalaththile Avargalidaththil Oru Oozhiyakkaaranai Anuppinaan. Andhath Thottakkaarar Avanai Adiththu, Verumaiyaaga Anuppivittaargal.
11 pinbu Avan Veroru Oozhiyakkaaranai Anuppinaan; Avanaiyum Avargal Adiththu, Avamaanappaduththi, Verumaiyaaga Anuppivittaargal.
12 avan Moondraandharamum Oru Oozhiyakkaaranai Anuppinaan; Avanaiyum Avargal Kaayappaduththi, Thuraththivittaargal.
13 appozhudhu Thiraatchaththottaththin Ejamaan: Naan Enna Seyyalaam, Enakkup Piriyamaana Kumaaranai Anuppinaal, Avanaiyaagilum Kandu Anjuvaargal Endru Enni, Avanai Anuppinaan.
14 thottakkaarar Avanaik Kandapodhu: Ivan Sudhandharavaali, Sudhandharam Nammudaiyadhaagumpadikku Ivanaik Kolluvom Vaarungal Endru Oruvarodoruvar Sollikkondu,
15 avanaith Thiraatchaththottaththirkup Purambe Thalli, Kondrupottaargal. Ippadiyirukka, Thiraatchaththottaththin Ejamaan Avargalai Enna Seyvaan?
16 avan Vandhu Andhath Thottakkaararaich Sangariththu, Thiraatchaththottaththai Veru Thottakkaararidaththil Koduppaan Allavaa Endraar. Avargal Adhaikkettu, Appadiyaagaadhiruppadhaaga Endraargal.
17 appozhudhu Avar Avargalaip Paarththu: Veedu Kattugiravargal Aagaadhendru Thallina Kalle, Moolaikkuth Thalaikkallaayitru Endru Ezhudhiyirukkira Vedhavaakkiyaththin Karuththenna?
18 andhak Kallinmel Vizhugiravan Evano Avan Norungippovaan, Adhu Evanmel Vizhumo Avanai Nasukkippodum Endraar.
19 piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum Thangalaikkuriththu Indha Uvamaiyaich Sonnaarendru Arindhu, Anneraththile Avaraippidikka Vagaithediyum Janangalukkup Bayandhirundhaargal.

20 avargal Samayampaarththu, Dhesaadhipadhiyin Aalugaikkum Adhigaaraththukkum Avarai Oppukkodukkumpadi Avarudaiya Pechchile Kutrankandupidikkalaamendru, Thangalai Unmaiyullavargalaaik Kaanbikkira Vevukaararai Avaridaththil Anuppinaargal.
21 avargal Vandhu: Podhagare, Neer Nidhaanamaaip Pesi Ubadhesikkireerendrum, Mugadhaatchaniyamillaamal Dhevanudaiya Maarkkaththaich Saththiyamaaip Podhikkireerendrum Arindhirukkirom.
22 iraayanukku Vari Kodukkiradhu Niyaayamo Allavo, Engalukkuch Sollum Endru Kettaargal.
23 avargaludaiya Thandhiraththai Avar Arindhu, Neengal Ennai En Sodhikkireergal?
24 oru Panaththai Enakkuk Kaanbiyungal. Idhilirukkira Soroobamum Melezhuththum Yaarudaiyadhu Endru Kettaar. Adharku Avargal: Raayanudaiyadhu Endraargal
25 adharku Avar: Appadiyaanaal, Raayanudaiyadhai Raayanukkum, Dhevanudaiyadhai Dhevanukkum Seluththungal Endraar.
26 avargal Avarai Janangalukku Munbaagap Pechchile Kutrampidikkakkoodaamal, Avar Sonna Uththaravaikkuriththu Aachchariyappattu, Mavunamaayirundhaargal.
27 uyirththezhudhal Illaiyendru Saadhikkira Sadhuseyaril Silar Avaridaththil Vandhu:

28 podhagare, Oruvan Manaiviyaiyudaiyavanaayirundhu Pillaiyillaamal Irandhuponaal, Avanudaiya Sagodharan Avan Manaiviyai Vivaagampanni Than Sagodharanukkuch Sandhaanamundaakkavendum Endru Mose Engalukku Ezhudhivaiththirukkiraare.
29 sagodharar Ezhuperirundhaargal, Avargalil Mooththavan Oru Pennai Vivaagampanni, Pillaiyillaamal Irandhuponaan.
30 pinbu Irandaansagodharan Avalai Vivaagampanni Avanum Pillaiyillaamal Irandhuponaan.
31 moondraansagodharanum Avalai Vivaagampanninaan. Appadiye Ezhuperum Avalai Vivaagampanni Pillaiyillaamal Irandhuponaargal.
32 ellaarukkum Pinbu Andha Sthireeyum Irandhuponaal.
33 ivvidhamaai Ezhuperum Avalai Vivaagampanniyirukka, Uyirththezhudhalil Avargalil Evanukku Aval Manaiviyaayiruppaal Endru Kettaargal.
34 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Indhap Pirabanjaththin Pillaigal Penkondum Penkotuththum Varugiraargal.
35 marumaiyaiyum Mariththorilirundhezhundhirukkudhalaiyum Adaiyap Paaththiraraaga Ennappadugiravargalo Pen Kolvadhumillai Pen Koduppadhumillai.
36 avargal Ini Marikkavumaattaargal; Avargal Uyirththezhudhalin Pillaigalaanapadiyaal Dhevathoodharukku Oppaanavargalumaai, Dhevanukkup Pillaigalumaayiruppaargal.

37 andriyum Mariththor Ezhundhiruppaargalenpadhai Moseyum Mutchetiyaippatriya Vaasagaththil Kaanpiththirukkiraar. Eppadiyenil. Karththarai Aabiragaamin Dhevanendrum Eesaakkin Dhevanendrum Yaakkobin Dhevanendrum Solliyirukkiraar.
38 avar Mariththorin Dhevanaayiraamal, Jeevanullorin Dhevanaayirukkiraar, Ellaarum Avarukkup Pizhaiththirukkiraargale Endraar.
39 appozhudhu Vedhapaaragaril Silar Adhaik Kettu: Podhagare, Nandraaich Sonneer Endraargal.
40 adhanpinbu Avargal Avaridaththil Verondrunketkath Thuniyavillai.
41 avar Avargalai Nokki: Kirisdhu Thaaveedhin Kumaaranendru Eppadich Sollugiraargal?
42 naan Ummudaiya Saththurukkalai Umakkup Paadhapadiyaakkippodumvaraikkum Neer Ennudaiya Valadhupaarisaththil Utkaarum Endru,
43 karththar En Aandavarudane Sonnaar Endru Thaaveedhu Thaane Sangeedha Pusdhagaththil Sollugiraane.
44 dhaaveedhu Avarai Aandavarendru Solliyirukka, Avanukku Avar Kumaaranaayiruppadhu Eppadi Endraar.
45 pinbu Janangalellaarum Ketkaiyil Avar Thammudaiya Seesharai Nokki:

46 neenda Angigalaith Thariththukkondu Thiriyavum, Sandhai Veligalil Vandhanangalai Adaiyavum, Jebaaalayangalil Mudhanmaiyaana Aasanangalil Utkaaravum, Virundhugalil Mudhanmaiyaana Idangalil Irukkavum Virumbi,
47 vidhavaigalin Veedugalaip Patchiththu, Paarvaikku Neenda Jebampannugira Vedhapaarakaraik Kuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirungal, Avargal Adhiga Aakkinaiyai Adaivaargal Endraar.
